alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 2:58AM CST until November 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW EXECTED TO CREATE HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS IN THE LAKE SUPERIOR SNOWBELT THROUGH THIS EVENING... .A one-two punch of snow is expected to impact Vilas County through this evening. Snow associated with a cold front will affect the area this morning. Behind the front, northwest winds will bring lake-effect snow showers from Lake Superior into the area this afternoon and this evening. The snow showers will taper off late tonight as winds turn to a more westerly direction. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation between 2 and 5 inches expected, with the highest totals near the Upper Michigan broder. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
